title: r/Entitledparents My Mom Stole My "Make-a-Wish" While I Was Dying
description: r/Entitledparents In today's episode, OP is a young child with brain damage. The doctors thought that OP was going to pass away, so he got a wish with the Make-A-Wish foundation. OP's mom basically said that since OP is dying anyway, he should just give his wish to his sister so that she could go to Disney World. OP's family even harassed and criticized OP, saying that they hate him for being selfish. Can you imagine trying to manipulate a literal dying child?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
